overview: A bunch of ghost cats haunt the neighborhood.  You can tell them apart from the others  because one of their ears has been snipped.  Itâ€™s called being ear tipped.  Ms. &^%$&^$%#^@ owns two pit bulls and works at a bird sanctuary. She is an avian veterinarian.  Ms. &^%$&^$%#^@ hates cats and especially the ones with the chipped ears.  Ms. &^%$&^$%#^@ has a history in the neighborhood for letting her dogs kill cats.
title: Paloma's Pit
